mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltTrans Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , TRANS_REQUST_TURN , TRANS_STAT_CD , TRANS_TGT_CD , CHRG_JOB_TP_CD , TRANS_REQUST_TP_CD , DOI_CD , CHRGER_CNFIRM_YN , RQESTER_CNFIRM_YN , TRANS_REQUST_SJ , TRANS_REQUST_CONT , TRANS_COM_ID , TRANS_RECR_ID , TRANS_REQUST_DT , TRANS_CNCL_DT , TRANS_COMPT_DT , TRANS_RQESTER_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_TRANS WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN = #{cnsltDetailTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND TRANS_REQUST_TURN = #{transRequstTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
